statements: UPDATE payments SET amount = 1000.50 WHERE payment_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890AB';
UPDATE payments SET payment_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE payment_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-2109876543AB';
UPDATE payments SET payment_gateway = 'PayPal' WHERE payment_id = '45678901-9876-9876-9876-1098765432BA';
UPDATE payments SET amount = 100.50 WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET payment_gateway = 'Stripe', destination_account_number = '78901234' WHERE source_account_number = '12345678';
UPDATE payments SET payment_date = '2022-01-30 10:00:00', payment_gateway = 'PayPal' WHERE amount > 500.00;
UPDATE payments SET payment_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_type = 'Refund' WHERE transaction_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = 200.50, payment_status = 'Paid' WHERE payment_id = '345e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE payments SET payment_amount = payment_amount + 100 WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.1 WHERE transaction_type = 'credit';
UPDATE payments SET payment_status = 'completed' WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE payment_gateways SET gateway_name = 'Updated Gateway Name' WHERE gateway_id = 1;
UPDATE bank_transactions SET status = 'Failed' WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
UPDATE fund_transfers SET receiver_account_number = 'New Receiver Account Number' WHERE transfer_id = 3;
UPDATE payment_gateways SET gateway_name = 'New Gateway Name' WHERE gateway_id = 1;
UPDATE bank_transactions SET status = 'Declined' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE fund_transfers SET status = 'Complete', transfer_amount = 500.00 WHERE transfer_id = 2001;
UPDATE PaymentMethods SET payment_method_name = 'Credit Card' WHERE payment_method_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'example@gmail.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET transaction_amount = 50.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE PaymentMethods SET integration_key = 'new_integration_key' WHERE payment_method_id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE Transactions SET transaction_amount = 1500.00, payment_method_id = 3 WHERE transaction_id = 5;
UPDATE online_banking_customers SET customer_name = 'New Name' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE bank_accounts SET balance = balance + 500.00 WHERE account_type = 'Checking';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount - 100.00 WHERE transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
UPDATE online_banking_customers SET email='new_email@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE bank_accounts SET balance=balance+100.00 WHERE account_type='Savings' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM online_banking_customers WHERE customer_name='John Doe');
UPDATE transactions SET amount=amount*0.9 WHERE transaction_type='Withdrawal' AND transaction_date>'2022-09-01';
